features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete authentication flow with Supabase Auth including login, signup, password reset, and password update. Supports email/password authentication with role-based access control (admin/user).

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard displaying key metrics, allocation statistics, tasks, and notes. Shows doctor allocation by period (morning/afternoon), exam counts, and role-specific information.

features.name: Scripts Management
features.description: System for managing reusable scripts organized by categories. Supports CRUD operations, drag-and-drop ordering, copy to clipboard functionality, and custom ordering.

features.name: Exams Management
features.description: Comprehensive exam management system with categorization, search, filtering, and detailed information including exam codes, preparation instructions, and related data.

features.name: Contacts Management
features.description: Contact management system organized by clusters and contact points. Supports hierarchical organization, phone numbers, emails, and notes.

features.name: Value Table System
features.description: Complex pricing and value management system for medical procedures. Includes Excel import/export functionality, value calculations, and detailed breakdowns of medical fees, exam costs, and materials.

features.name: Office Management
features.description: Management system for medical offices/consult√≥rios organized by categories. Supports office allocation, scheduling, and categorization.

features.name: Professionals Management
features.description: System for managing medical professionals with detailed information including specialties, age ranges served, fitting acceptance, and contact details.

features.name: Notes and Annotations
features.description: Annotation system for general notes and specialized stomatotherapy notes. Supports categorization, search, and detailed information management.

features.name: Messages/Notices System
features.description: Internal messaging system for team communication. Supports sector-based filtering, message creation, and display with timestamps.

features.name: User Management
features.description: Admin-only user management system for managing team members, roles, and permissions. Includes user creation, editing, and role assignment.

features.name: Global Search
features.description: Comprehensive search functionality across all data types (scripts, exams, contacts, professionals, etc.) with real-time results and keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+K).

features.name: Data Context and State Management
features.description: Centralized data management using React Context with Supabase integration. Handles all CRUD operations, data synchronization, and local storage fallback.

features.name: Theme System
features.description: Dark/light theme support with system preference detection and user preference persistence.

features.name: Navigation and Layout
features.description: Main application layout with sidebar navigation, header with user profile, and responsive design. Includes mobile-responsive navigation.

features.name: Data Migration
features.description: JSON-based data import/export system for migrating data between environments or backing up data. Supports full data replacement.

features.name: Excel Integration
features.description: Excel file import functionality for value tables, supporting automatic data parsing and synchronization.

features.name: Drag and Drop Functionality
features.description: Sortable lists with drag-and-drop reordering using @dnd-kit for scripts and other ordered items.

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Global error boundary for catching and displaying React errors gracefully.

features.name: Responsive Design Utilities
features.description: Custom hooks and utilities for responsive design and mobile detection.

features.name: Toast Notifications
features.description: Toast notification system for user feedback on actions and errors.

features.name: Form Validation
features.description: Zod schemas for form validation across all data entry forms.

features.name: Supabase Integration
features.description: Complete Supabase client setup with authentication, database queries, and real-time subscriptions.
